unnormalised: Edu-Tech Buzz: Scholarship Portals – Your Ticket to Dreams!
normalised: Edu-Tech Buzz: Scholarship Portals – Your Ticket to Dreams!

unnormalised: Forget endless chai sessions with seniors trying to figure out scholarships! A new wave of scholarship portals is making education funding easier than ever. Think of them as a Zomato for academic aid – you input your details, and boom, a buffet of options appears!
normalised: Forget endless chai sessions with seniors trying to figure out scholarships! A new wave of scholarship portals is making education funding easier than ever. Think of them as a Zomato for academic aid – you input your details, and boom, a buffet of options appears!

unnormalised: From covering tuition at IIT Madras to funding that research trip to Kerala, these portals are connecting students with everything from government schemes to private endowments. Many are even AI-powered, matching you with niche scholarships you wouldn't find otherwise.
normalised: From covering tuition at I I T Madras to funding that research trip to Kerala, these portals are connecting students with everything from government schemes to private endowments. Many are even A I powered, matching you with niche scholarships you wouldn't find otherwise.

unnormalised: Some popular names include 'Vidya Dhan,' 'Saral Scholarship,' and even portals specific to states like Karnataka and Tamil Nadu. Remember Ramesh from your Class 12th? He snagged a full ride thanks to one of these portals – paid for everything, even his biryani cravings during exams!
normalised: Some popular names include 'Vidya Dhan,' 'Saral Scholarship,' and even portals specific to states like Karnataka and Tamil Nadu. Remember Ramesh from your Class twelfth? He snagged a full ride thanks to one of these portals – paid for everything, even his biryani cravings during exams!

unnormalised: So, ditch the Onam sadness of potentially missing out on higher education due to funds. Give these portals a spin. They could be your path to achieving that dream course or launching your startup! Check them out today! Rs. 10,000 or Rs. 1,00,000 - it all helps!
normalised: So, ditch the Onam sadness of potentially missing out on higher education due to funds. Give these portals a spin. They could be your path to achieving that dream course or launching your startup! Check them out today! Rupee ten thousand or rupee one hundred thousand - it all helps!
